title: Lex Marshall from Daughters
itunes:title: Lex Marshall from Daughters
description:
Episode 339 - This week we have Lex Marshall, the vocalist from Daughters on the show. I adore their newest LP and once it became a favorite of mine, I had to have him on. We discuss the Providence hardcore scene, being confrontational and life paths. He's a great hang and I promise you will enjoy him as well. Visit Rockabilia.com and use the code PCJABBERJAW for 10% off of your order! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
